objects.text:
• 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display
• A16 Bionic - fastest chip ever
• 48MP camera with ProRAW
• Dynamic Island interface

product_details.name: iPhone 14 Pro - Premium Purple Power | Breakthrough Innovation
product_details.description:
• Stunning 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display with ProMotion technology
• Elegant purple finish with premium aerospace-grade aluminum design
• Advanced dual-camera system with 48MP main sensor
• A16 Bionic chip - the fastest chip ever in a smartphone
• Dynamic Island - revolutionary new way to interact with notifications
• 5G capable for ultra-fast downloads and streaming
• All-day battery life with up to 23 hours of video playback
• Face ID for secure authentication and Apple Pay
• iOS 16 with powerful new features and customization options
• MagSafe compatible for fast wireless charging and accessories
• Ceramic Shield front cover - tougher than any smartphone glass
• IP68 water and dust resistance

banner_details:
This promotional banner features a dynamic layout with bold typography and high-contrast colors to highlight a limited-time smartphone offer. The background uses a diagonal gradient split with overlay graphics for depth, while a large product image dominates the right side. The left section organizes multiple text layers for impact—'heading_1' and 'heading_2' are large bold texts conveying the main offer, supported by 'tagline', 'product_name', 'subheading', and 'description' for feature highlights. ‘offer_text’ and ‘price’ emphasize urgency and affordability, and a call-to-action button composed of ‘cta_background’ and ‘cta’ invites immediate response.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Violet (#1E0F30)
- Royal Purple Gradient (#8A56FF → #5B3FD9)
- Bright Yellow (#FFCC00)
- Pure White (#FFFFFF)
- Soft Lavender (#B794FF)
product_color: The product image features a sleek, modern smartphone in a striking lavender purple color, paired with a vibrant blue display. The dominant hues include soft lavender (#B9A9F4), deep royal blue (#2B3C8B), and electric blue gradients (#3B66F6 to #6B8AF6). The device’s back showcases a matte lavender finish that integrates seamlessly with the darker, glossy shades of the camera ring and logo. The screen blends light and dark blue tones in a smooth radial gradient, giving a futuristic depth effect. For an advertisement banner, a complementary palette with lavender, electric blue, midnight black (#000000), and white (#FFFFFF) delivers a premium and tech-savvy appeal.
